20110122113008.000|20110122113010.000|CC1|UP TO CODE AND THE INSULATION OF
20110122113010.000|20110122113011.000|CC1|THE UNIT ITSELF.                
20110122113011.000|20110122113020.000|CC1|OF COURSE PRICES WILL AREA.     
20110122113020.000|20110122113025.000|CC1|>> OUR STATION IS SET UP SO IT'S
20110122113025.000|20110122113027.000|CC1|REALLY NOT A MONEY MAKER FOR THE
20110122113027.000|20110122113028.000|CC1|STATION OWNER.                  
20110122113028.000|20110122113030.000|CC1|IT'S MORE OF AN AMENITY IN OUR  
20110122113030.000|20110122113030.000|CC1|OPINION.                        
20110122113030.000|20110122113034.000|CC1|SO IT'S PROVIDING LIKE PROVIDING
20110122113034.000|20110122113036.000|CC1|VENDING MACHINES IN YOUR        
20110122113036.000|20110122113041.000|CC1|BUILDING, OR PAY PHONES.        
20110122113041.000|20110122113044.000|CC1|SOME OF THE INDUSTRY LEADERS    
20110122113044.000|20110122113046.000|CC1|HAVE LARGE D.O.E. GRANTS IN     
20110122113046.000|20110122113049.000|CC1|PROVIDING FREE PUBLIC CHARGE    
20110122113049.000|20110122113050.000|CC1|STATIONS.                       
20110122113050.000|20110122113051.000|CC1|THERE'S A FEDERAL TAX CREDIT    
20110122113051.000|20110122113052.000|CC1|THAT WAS JUST EXTENDED AT THE   
20110122113052.000|20110122113054.000|CC1|END OF LAST YEAR THAT PROVIDES  
20110122113054.000|20110122113056.000|CC1|UP TO A 50% TAX CREDIT FOR THE  
20110122113056.000|20110122113059.000|CC1|COST OF THE CHARGE STATION AND  
20110122113059.000|20110122113101.000|CC1|INSULATION OF THE UNIT UP TO    
20110122113101.000|20110122113104.000|CC1|$50,000, WHICH IS IMPORTANT FOR 
20110122113104.000|20110122113104.000|CC1|US.                             
20110122113104.000|20110122113107.000|CC1|EACH STATE HAS THEIR OWN        
20110122113107.000|20110122113108.000|CC1|INCENTIVES AND THEY AREA FROM   
20110122113108.000|20110122113108.000|CC1|STATE TO STATE.                 
20110122113108.000|20110122113110.000|CC1|BUT THERE ARE QUITE A FEW       
20110122113110.000|20110122113111.000|CC1|INCENTIVES.                     
20110122113111.000|20110122113112.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY ON THE VEHICLE SIDE
20110122113112.000|20110122113113.000|CC1|THERE'S INCENTIVES FOR VEHICLES 
20110122113113.000|20110122113114.000|CC1|AS WELL.                        
20110122113114.000|20110122113116.000|CC1|WE'RE OF THE OPINION THAT ANY   
20110122113116.000|20110122113118.000|CC1|FEDERAL FUNDING OR INCENTIVES   
20110122113118.000|20110122113120.000|CC1|SHOULD GO TO THE PROPERTY OWNERS
20110122113120.000|20110122113121.000|CC1|OR FACILITY MANAGERS.           
20110122113121.000|20110122113123.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW WE'RE COMPETING       
20110122113123.000|20110122113124.000|CC1|AGAINST FREE AND FREE'S TOUGH TO
20110122113124.000|20110122113125.000|CC1|COMPETE WITH.                   
20110122113125.000|20110122113127.000|CC1|SO IN OUR OPINION, PEOPLE       
20110122113127.000|20110122113128.000|CC1|PURCHASING THE UNITS, WHICH ARE 
20110122113128.000|20110122113129.000|CC1|GOING TO BE YOUR PROPERTY       
20110122113129.000|20110122113131.000|CC1|MANAGERS AND YOUR FACILITIES,   
20110122113131.000|20110122113133.000|CC1|YOUR FACILITY MANAGERS, THEY    
20110122113133.000|20110122113134.000|CC1|SHOULD BE THE ONES THAT ARE     
20110122113134.000|20110122113136.000|CC1|GETTING ANY TYPE OF INCENTIVE,  
20110122113136.000|20110122113137.000|CC1|NOT NECESSARILY THE             
20110122113137.000|20110122113137.000|CC1|MANUFACTURER.
